text: Henry A. Lester is an American biologist, currently the Bren Professor at California Institute of Technology. He received an A.B. from Harvard College in 1966 and a Ph.D. from Rockefeller University in 1971. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:California Institute of Technology faculty Category:21st-century American biologists Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Rockefeller University alumni
title: Henry A. Lester
